price: 48 Lorsqu’on leur demande de s’incliner en prière, ils s’y refusent avec fierté.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
